movies.title: The Night Caller
movies.plot: A serial killer frightens Paris by phoning young ladies at night, telling them insults about their lives. Minos, as he calls himself, wants to prevent the world from free women and so he targets them. Commissaire Letellier is given the investigation and has a hard time with the maniac.
movies.simplePlot: Commissaire Letellier and Inspector Moissac are tracking Minos, a serial killer whose victims are women.

biography.bio: The son of the renowned French sculptor Paul Belmondo, he studied at Conservatoire National Superieur d'Art Dramatique (CNSAD); after the minor stage performances he made his screen debut in À pied, à cheval et en voiture (1957) but the episodes with his participation were cut before release. However, the breakthrough role in Jean-Luc Godard's Breathless (1960) made him one of the key figures in the French New Wave. Since mid-60s he completely switched to commercial mainstream pictures and became a big comedy and action star in France. Following the example of Alain Delon he founded his own production company Cerito named after his grandmother's maiden name. In 1989 he was awarded Cesar for his performance in Itinéraire d'un enfant gâté (1988) . Recently he returned to stage performing in the Theatre Marigny in Paris. He still appears in the movies but not so often as before preferring mostly dramatic roles. The president of France distinguished him with order of Legion of Honour. Belmondo has daughter Florence and son Paul. His elder daughter Patricia died in a fire in 1994. None of his children became actors though you could have seen his son Paul in the episodic role in Itinéraire d'un enfant gâté (1988).
biography.name: Jean-Paul Belmondo

biography.bio: Mr. Denner began studying in Paris with Charles Dullin in 1945. Four years later, he joined the National Popular Theater. In 1962, he was offered his first big film role, in Bluebeard (1963). He made thirty films after that, notably with Claude Lelouch and François Truffaut. Over the years, he worked under some of France's best-known directors, including Louis Malle. During the 70's and 80's, he notoriously personified police detectives in famous French "Films Noirs" such as Mille milliards de dollars (1982) or The Night Caller (1975).
biography.name: Charles Denner

biography.bio: Adalberto Maria Merli was born on January 14, 1938 in Rome, Lazio, Italy. He is known for his work on The Knock Out Cop (1973), The Card Player (2004) and La villeggiatura (1973).
biography.name: Adalberto Maria Merli

biography.bio: Rosy Varte was born on November 22, 1923 in Istanbul, Turkey as Nevarte Manouelian. She is known for her work on Maguy (1985), Love on the Run (1979) and Love at Twenty (1962). She was married to Pierre Badel. She died on January 14, 2012 in Neuilly-sur-Seine, Hauts-de-Seine, Île-de-France, France.
biography.name: Rosy Varte

biography.bio: Roland Dubillard was born on December 2, 1923 in Paris, France. He was an actor and writer, known for La fonte de Barlaeus (1982), The Night Caller (1975) and L'alcool tue (1947). He died on December 14, 2011 in Paris.
biography.name: Roland Dubillard

biography.bio: Jean Martin was born on March 6, 1922 in Paris, France. He was an actor, known for The Battle of Algiers (1966), My Name Is Nobody (1973) and The King and the Mockingbird (1980). He died on February 2, 2009 in Paris.
biography.name: Jean Martin

biography.bio: Catherine Morin is an actress, known for The Night Caller (1975), Le voyage en province (1975) and Ils sont fous ces Normands (1981).
biography.name: Catherine Morin

biography.bio: Germana Carnacina was born on October 30, 1952 in Rome, Lazio, Italy. She is an actress, known for The Night Caller (1975), Les tueurs à gages (1972) and Belli e brutti ridono tutti (1979).
biography.name: Germana Carnacina

biography.bio: Giovanni Cianfriglia was born on April 5, 1935 in Anzio, Lazio, Italy. He is known for his work on Trinity: Gambling for High Stakes (1978), Superargo and the Faceless Giants (1968) and Le shérif et les extraterrestres (1979).
biography.name: Giovanni Cianfriglia

biography.bio: Henry Djanik was born on March 21, 1926 in France as Henry Djanikian. He is known for his work on Il était une fois... la vie (1986), Les maîtres du temps (1982) and The Night Caller (1975). He died on August 18, 2008 in France.
biography.name: Henry Djanik

biography.bio: Louis Samier is an actor, known for The Night Caller (1975), La dérobade (1973) and Jeanne d'Arc (1973).
biography.name: Louis Samier

biography.bio: Jacques Paoli is an actor, known for La nouvelle orangerie (1966), Le regard Picasso (1967) and The Night Caller (1975).
biography.name: Jacques Paoli

biography.bio: Jean-Louis Fortuit is an actor, known for La chèvre (1981), The Night Caller (1975) and The Escapees (1981).
biography.name: Jean-Louis Fortuit

biography.bio: Gilberte Géniat was born on February 17, 1916 in Paris, Ile-de-France, France as Gilberte Martel de la Chesnaye. She was an actress, known for Diary of a Chambermaid (1964), Get Out Your Handkerchiefs (1978) and Quai des Orfèvres (1947). She was married to François-Régis Passerat de Silans. She died on June 28, 1986 in Paris.
biography.name: Gilberte Géniat

biography.bio: Philippe Brigaud is an actor, known for The Dinner Game (1998), Le fantôme de la liberté (1974) and Le placard (2001).
biography.name: Philippe Brigaud

filmingLocations.location: 1 Place de l'Hôtel de ville, Asnières-sur-Seine, France
